sect2.title: Fill Selection Outline
sect2.para: Using this command, you can fill the current selection with the current foreground color, or with the current pattern. It opens a dialog where you can choose between these two options. This command is only active when a selection exists.

sect3.title: Activating the Command
sect3.para:
You can access this command from the main menu through
Edit Fill Selection Outlineâ€¦ .

sect3.title: Options
sect3.para: This command brings up a dialog window:

listitem.para: The foreground color of the toolbox is used.
The background color of the toolbox is used.
The active pattern of the toolbox is used.
This option is enabled by default.
